Author: rms
Content:
But how long do we have until the dollar falls through the floor?

If I had some significant assets I would be starting a company in Europe so I can afford to rebuy America once it is dirt cheap.

Author: vlad
Content: I don't see how Xobni, written in C#, is more Web 2.0 than Skype is.  I disagree that Web 2.0 means stuff for nerds, as well.  Xobni isn't for nerds.
